new: Added stronger radar ping contrast for objective markers.
Added longer on-screen event notifications during extraction phases.
changes: Combat flow from wave 6 to wave 14 was retuned to reduce sudden spawn spikes while keeping late-wave pressure.
Beacon effects remain visible during heavy particle scenes.
Early contract rewards were increased to unlock first major loadout upgrades sooner.
Duplicate drop protection is now stronger when opening supply caches.
bugs: Known issue: one arena still has a clipping edge near the upper platform.
misc: A hotfix for the clipping edge is already in testing for the next micro update.
footnotes: Design intent remains focused on rewarding positioning and movement over RNG survivability.

changes: Reconnect logic now restores players into the correct match state after regional host migration.
bugs: Reduced crash rate in sessions longer than 35 minutes.
footnotes: This was a stability-focused hotfix release.

new: Added two optional shortcut paths for advanced players.
changes: Checkpoint spacing has been smoothed across the course.
